verbs.description: [ARG0: Legendary journalist Dan Rather] [V: called] out [ARG1: Donald Trump , who is attending the G7 conference] , [ARGM-CAU: for " coddling dictators while spitting in the faces of our best friends] . "
Legendary journalist Dan Rather called out Donald Trump , who [V: is] attending the G7 conference , for " coddling dictators while spitting in the faces of our best friends . "
